title: Satin nickel hardware throughout residence, Walk in closets
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'Amazing Apartments with an Amazing Location', 'Enjoy peaceful living in a vibrant downtown setting at your new home.', 'Our community was designed for convenience and enjoyment.', 'We are surrounded by beautiful downtown Madison Heights with numerous restaurants, theaters, art galleries and more.', 'Oakland Mall is also just a short walk away and home to many brand-name shops.', 'You will immediately see why residents are drawn to our unique mix of peaceful living within a cosmopolitan setting.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 25', 'OR Text', '25', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 925 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Beautifully designed kitchen featuring maple cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring', '- Satin nickel hardware throughout residence', '- Well designed floor plans ranging from 825 to 925 square feet', '- Walk in closets', '- Spacious living room, dining room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet', '- Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors', 'Community Amenities', '- 24 hour Emergency Maintenance Response Guarantee', '- 24 hour fitness center.', '- Cat friendly', '- Online Resident Portal', '- Walking distance to Oakland Mall, AMC Theater, and local shopping.', '- Easy highway access', 'Pet Policy', 'You may have a maximum of two cats in your home.', 'Office Hours', 'Office Hours', 'Mon-Fri 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Sat-Sun 10:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Concord Towers', '32600 Concord Drive, Madison Heights, MI, 48071', 'bjZuW1x8']
